texts.DisplayName:Name: Name
texts.GatewayPlanDeletionConfirmationMessage: The gateway plan will be deleted. Are you sure?
texts.Payment:Request:0001: Can't update existing External Plan Id
texts.PlanDeletionConfirmationMessage: The plan will be deleted. Are you sure?
texts.Iyzico:LOST_CARD: The card has been marked as lost.
texts.Iyzico:STOLEN_CARD: The card has been marked as stolen.
texts.Iyzico:NOT_PERMITTED_TO_CARDHOLDER: Operation not permitted to card holder.
texts.Iyzico:FRAUD_SUSPECT: A fraud suspect has been identified.
texts.Iyzico:RESTRICTED_BY_LAW: Your card is closed to e-commerce transactions. Please contact with your bank.
texts.Iyzico:CARD_NOT_PERMITTED: The card did not allow the transaction.
texts.Iyzico:UNKNOWN: An error occurred while processing payment.
texts.Iyzico:REFER_TO_CARD_ISSUER: Need to receive approval by bank.
texts.Iyzico:BLOCKED_CARD: The card has been identified as blocked.
texts.Iyzico:COMMUNICATION_OR_SYSTEM_ERROR: Communication or system error has been occured.
texts.Iyzico:NO_SUCH_ISSUER: Issuer could not found for the card.
texts.Iyzico:NOT_PERMITTED_TO_INSTALLMENT: Installment option not allowed for the terminal.
texts.Iyzico:RESTRICTED_CARD: The card has been identified as restricted.
texts.Iyzico:ISSUER_OR_SWITCH_INOPERATIVE: Bank or terminal is not processing the operation.
texts.Iyzico:INVALID_EXPIRE_YEAR_MONTH: Expiration year or month is invalid.
texts.Iyzico:REFUND_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_THIS_DEBIT: There is not enough balance on the card.
texts.Iyzico:APPROVED_COMPLETED: This transaction has been already approved.
texts.Iyzico:INVALID_CHARS_IN_EMAIL: Email is not in valid format.
texts.Iyzico:DEBIT_CARDS_INSTALLMENT_NOT_ALLOW: Installments not allowed with debit cards.
texts.Iyzico:NOT_PERMITTED_TO_FOREIGN_CARD: Terminal is closed to foreign/international cards.
texts.Iyzico:REQUEST_BLOCKED_BY_BANK: The request has been blocked by bank.
texts.Iyzico:SALES_AMOUNT_LESS_THAN_AWARD: The sales amount cannot be lower than the award points.
texts.PriceSubscriptionTooltip: Subscription pricing is managed by payment gateway.
